definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge

sentences.english: Reunification of China today is consonant with popular sentiment and the general trend of development.
sentences.chinese: 今天，實現中國的統一，是人心所向，大勢所趨。

sentences.english: Heating Metering and Charging Should Be Practised First in Enterprises;
sentences.chinese: 按熱計量合理收費和控制管理已是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: In general, we're now living thee-commerce age, online shopping is the trend.
sentences.chinese: 不過總的來說，電子信息時代，網上購物是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: I can see cloud PLM is trending.
sentences.chinese: 看得出，PLM採用雲技術已經是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: It is a tendency to open up this trade.
sentences.chinese: 入世後，開放我國律師業已是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: With raid growth of the economy, human capital investment becomes the general trend.
sentences.chinese: 隨着經濟的高速發展，人力資本出資已經是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: Application of lead-free solders is main trend in the electronic industry.
sentences.chinese: 電子製造過程無鉛化已是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: System closure has become the trend of the paper industry.
sentences.chinese: 封閉循環用水已成爲造紙工業的大勢所趨。

sentences.english: The reunification of the Chinese nation is a general trend which cannot be blocked.
sentences.chinese: 祖國統一是大勢所趨，不可阻擋。

sentences.english: General trend indicates that from "entity just" to "procedure just".
sentences.chinese: 從“實體正義”走向“程序正義”是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: The development of e-business in minor enterprises represents general trend.
sentences.chinese: 中小企業進行電子商務是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: It is a trend that the auto winding machine will substitute the traditional winding machine.
sentences.chinese: 用自動絡筒機取代普通絡筒機是大勢所趨。

sentences.english: It becomes a trend for the enterprises to join the innovation alliance.
sentences.chinese: 企業選擇組建聯盟進行合作創新成爲大勢所趨。

definition: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
peer competition/to function as rivals/to make claims as an equal
Four Asian Tigers/East Asian Tigers/Four Little Dragons (East Asian economic powers: Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore and Hong Kong)
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
see 每況愈下|每况愈下[mei3 kuang4 yu4 xia4]
